p:
For the post-glacial lakes (Sweden)
70 , boreal meso-eutrophic forest ponds (Canada)
15 , temperate river Saar (Germany)
42 , and temperate eutrophic city pond (Netherlands), data were obtained directly from the authors. Raw data from the temperate farm ponds (USA) were obtained from Table 1 of ref.
68 . Data of the subtropical eutrophic city pond (China) was extracted from ref.
69 , using WebPlotDigitizer ( http://arohatgi.info/WebPlotDigitizer), a web-based tool to obtain high-precision numerical data from plots.
